keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: List of search keywords, for example ["iphone 17 case", "usb c hub"].

max_items_per_keyword.title: Max items per keyword
max_items_per_keyword.description: Maximum number of products to scrape for each keyword (recommended 10–200).

max_pages.title: Max pages per keyword
max_pages.description: Maximum number of result pages to crawl for each keyword (1–20).

country.title: Marketplace / Country
country.description: Amazon marketplace to scrape (US, UK, DE, FR, JP).

min_rating.title: Min rating
min_rating.description: Filter out products with rating lower than this value, e.g. 4.0.

min_reviews.title: Min reviews count
min_reviews.description: If > 0, filter out products with fewer reviews than this value.

exclude_sponsored.title: Exclude sponsored products
exclude_sponsored.description: If true, sponsored results will be filtered out.

fetch_details.title: Fetch product details (category, more info)
fetch_details.description: If true, the Actor will open product detail pages for the first N items (see max_detail_items).

max_detail_items.title: Max detail items per keyword
max_detail_items.description: Maximum number of products per keyword for which to open the detail page (only used when fetch_details=true).
